Let's keep in touch.

Did you know Whitman offered $31 million in merit and need-based aid last year? Confirm your contact details below and we'll send you more information.

At Whitman you can choose from 48 majors and 34 minors, or you can design your own. Confirm the details below and we’ll send you more information.

Over 80 percent of our students participate in intramural sports, from flag football to table tennis. Confirm your details below and we'll send you more information.
